nls.description: Idea approval workflow. After approval, selected ideas are converted to projects.
nls.name: Idea Review

nls.description: The system checks if the idea has the Fast Track check box enabled.
nls.name: System Checks for Fast Track

nls.description: The system checks if a Target manager is named on the idea.
nls.name: System Checks for Target Manager

nls.description: Because no Target manager is assigned to the Idea the system sends an action item to the idea originating requestor to assign a Target manager.
nls.name: Send Action Item to Name Target Manager

Action.aiDescription:
The following idea was recently submitted for approval. However, the idea does not yet have a Manager assigned. Please ensure that a manager is assigned then click Done for the idea approval process to resume.
Idea: ${thisIdea.name}

nls.description: The person who created the idea gets an action item to provide a Target manager on the idea.
nls.name: Set Target Manager Action Item

message.description:
Recentment s'ha enviat la següent idea per a la seva aprovació. Tanmateix, encara no se li ha assignat un gestor. Assigni'l un gestor i faci clic a Terminado per reprendre el procés d'aprovació de l'idea.
Idea: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: Falta de gestor en la idea: ${thisIdea.name}

message.description:
Následující návrh byl nedávno odeslán ke schválení. Návrh však zatím nemá přiřazeného manažera. Přiřaďte manažera a poté kliknutím na tlačítko Hotovo nechte pokračovat proces schválení návrhu.
Návrh: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: U návrhu: ${thisIdea.name} chybí manažer.

message.description:
Følgende idé er for nylig sendt til godkendelse. Der er imidlertid ikke tilknyttet en leder til ideen endnu. Sørg for, at der tilknytte sen leder, og klik derefter på Udført for at processen med at godkende ideen kan genoptages.
Idea: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: Leder mangler for idé: ${thisIdea.name}

message.description:
Die folgende Idee wurde kürzlich zur Genehmigung vorgelegt. Allerdings hat die Idee noch keinen zugewiesenen Manager. Stellen Sie sicher, dass ihr ein Manager zugewiesen wird, und klicken Sie auf 'Fertig', damit der Genehmigungsprozess für die Idee wieder aufgenommen wird.
Idee: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: Manager fehlt in Idee: ${thisIdea.name}

message.description:
The following idea was recently submitted for approval. However, the idea does not yet have a Manager assigned. Please ensure that a manager is assigned then click Done for the idea approval process to resume.
Idea: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: Manager Missing on Idea: ${thisIdea.name}

message.description:
Recientemente se ha enviado la siguiente idea para su aprobación. Sin embargo, todavía no se le ha asignado un gestor. Asígnele un gestor y haga clic en Terminado para reanudar el proceso de aprobación de la idea.
Idea: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: Falta de gestor en la idea: ${thisIdea.name}

message.description:
Seuraava idea on hiljattain lähetetty hyväksyttäväksi. Ideaan ei kuitenkaan ole vielä kiinnitetty vastuuhenkilöä. Varmista, että vastuuhenkilö on kiinnitetty, ja jatka sitten idean hyväksyntäprosessia valitsemalla Valmis.
Idea: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: Vastuuhenkilö puuttuu ideasta: ${thisIdea.name}

message.description:
L'idée suivante a été récemment soumise pour approbation. Cependant, aucun responsable n'a été affecté à cette idée. Affectez un responsable, puis cliquez sur Terminé(e) afin de reprendre le processus d'approbation de l'idée.
Idée : ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: Responsable manquant pour l'idée : ${thisIdea.name}

message.description:
A következő ötletet nemrégiben nyújtották be jóváhagyásra. Nincs azonban vezető rendelve az ötlethez. Rendeljen hozzá vezetőt, majd kattintson a Kész gombra, hogy folytatódjon az ötlet jóváhagyási folyamata.
Ötlet: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: A vezető hiányzik ennél az ötletnél: ${thisIdea.name}

message.description:
L'idea seguente è stata inviata recentemente per l'approvazione. Tuttavia, non è stato assegnato un manager per l'idea. Verificare che l'assegnazione del manager venga eseguita, quindi fare clic su Completato per riprendere il processo di approvazione dell'idea.
Idea: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: Manager mancante per l'idea: ${thisIdea.name}

message.description:
以下のアイデアは最近、承認要求されました。ただし、このアイデアにはまだマネージャが割り当てられていません。マネージャが割り当て済みであることを確認して [完了] をクリックし、アイデアの承認プロセスを再開してください。
アイデア: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: このアイデアにはマネージャが指定されていません: ${thisIdea.name}

message.description:
다음 아이디어는 최근에 승인을 위해 제출되었습니다. 하지만 이 아이디어에 관리자가 아직 배정되지 않았습니다. 아이디어 승인 프로세스를 다시 시작하려면 관리자를 배정한 후 [완료]를 클릭하십시오.
아이디어: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: ${thisIdea.name} 아이디어에 관리자 누락

message.description:
Het volgende idee is onlangs ingediend voor goedkeuring. Er is echter nog geen manager aan het idee toegewezen. Zorg ervoor dat er een manager is toegewezen en klik vervolgens op Gereed om het goedkeuringsproces voor ideeën te hervatten.
Idee: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: Manager ontbreekt bij idee: ${thisIdea.name}

message.description:
Følgende idé ble nylig sendt til godkjenning. Men ideen har ennå ikke en tildelt leder. Sørg for å tildele en leder og klikk på Ferdig for å gjenoppta idégodkjenningsprosessen.
Idé: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: Leder mangler på idé: ${thisIdea.name}

message.description:
Następującą ideę przesłano ostatnio do zatwierdzenia. Idea nie ma jednak jeszcze przypisanego menedżera. Przypisz menedżera, a następnie kliknij opcję Gotowe, aby wznowić proces zatwierdzania idei.
Idea: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: Brak menedżera idei: ${thisIdea.name}

message.description:
A ideia abaixo foi enviada para aprovação recentemente. No entanto, ela ainda não tem um gerente atribuído. Atribua um e clique em Concluído para prosseguir com o processo de aprovação.
Ideia: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: Gerente ausente na ideia: ${thisIdea.name}

message.description:
Следующая идея представлена для утверждения. Но для идеи не назначен менеджер. Выполните назначение менеджера и нажмите «готово» для возобновления процесса утверждения.
Идея: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: Нет менеджера идеи: ${thisIdea.name}

message.description:
Följande idé skickades nyligen för godkännande. Men idén har inte fått någon tilldelad projektledare ännu. Kontrollera att en ansvarig tilldelas och klicka sedan på Klar för att återuppta idégodkännandeprocessen.
Idé: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: Ansvarig saknas för idé: ${thisIdea.name}

message.description:
Aşağıdaki fikir kısa bir süre önce onay için gönderildi. Ancak, henüz fikre atanmış bir Yönetici yok. Lütfen bir yöneticinin atandığından emin olun ve ardından fikir onaylama sürecinin devam etmesi için Tamamlandı'yı tıklatın.
Fikir: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: Fikirde Yönetici Eksik: ${thisIdea.name}

message.description:
以下构思最近被提交以供审核。但是，此构思尚未分配经理。请确保分配一个经理，然后单击“完成”以便让构思核准过程重新开始。
构思: ${thisIdea.name}
message.name: 此构思缺少经理: ${thisIdea.name}

message.description:
最近已提交以下構想供核准。然而，構想尚未獲派任何 [管理員]。請確定指派一名管理員後按一下 [完成]，以恢復構想核准流程。
構想：${thisIdea.name}
message.name: 構想 ${thisIdea.name} 上缺少管理員

nls.description: The system checks if a sponsor is assigned on the idea.
nls.name: System Checks for Sponsor

nls.description: Idea owner gets action item to specify sponsor on the idea.
nls.name: Send Action Item to Name Sponsor

nls.description: Set Sponsor
nls.name: Set Sponsor Action Item

message.name: Falta el patrocinador en la idea: ${thisIdea.name}
U návrhu: ${thisIdea.name} chybí sponzor
Sponsor mangler for ide: ${thisIdea.name}
Sponsor fehlt in Idee: ${thisIdea.name}

Sponsori puuttuu ideasta: ${thisIdea.name}
Sponsor manquant pour l'idée : ${thisIdea.name}
A támogató hiányzik ennél az ötletnél: ${thisIdea.name}
Sponsor mancante per l'idea: ${thisIdea.name}
このアイデアにはスポンサーが指定されていません: ${thisIdea.name}
${thisIdea.name} 아이디어에 후원자 누락
Sponsor ontbreekt bij idee: ${thisIdea.name}
Sponsor mangler på idé: ${thisIdea.name}
Brak sponsora idei: ${thisIdea.name}
Patrocinador ausente na ideia: ${thisIdea.name}
Нет спонсора идеи: ${thisIdea.name}
Sponsor saknas för idén: ${thisIdea.name}
Şu Fikirde Sponsor Eksik: ${thisIdea.name}
此构思缺少赞助商: ${thisIdea.name}
構想 ${thisIdea.name} 上缺少贊助者

nls.description: The sponsor reviews the idea and marks it as approved or incomplete.
nls.name: Sponsor Reviews Idea

nls.description: Idea review by Sponsor
nls.name: Review Idea

message.name: Revisi la idea: ${thisIdea.name}
Posuďte návrh: ${thisIdea.name}.
Gennemgå idé: ${thisIdea.name}
Prüfen Sie die Idee: ${thisIdea.name}
Please review idea: ${thisIdea.name}
Revise la idea: ${thisIdea.name}
Tarkista idea: ${thisIdea.name}
Révisez l'idée : ${thisIdea.name}
Ellenőrizze a következő ötletet: ${thisIdea.name}
Eseguire la revisione dell'idea: ${thisIdea.name}
アイデアをレビューしてください: ${thisIdea.name}
${thisIdea.name} 아이디어를 검토하십시오.
Beoordeel idee: ${thisIdea.name}
Gjennomgå idé: ${thisIdea.name}
Przejrzyj ideę: ${thisIdea.name}
Analise a ideia: ${thisIdea.name}
Выполните проверку идеи: ${thisIdea.name}
Granska idé: ${thisIdea.name}
Lütfen fikri gözden geçirin: ${thisIdea.name}
请复查构思: ${thisIdea.name}
請檢閱構想：${thisIdea.name}

nls.description: When the sponsor approves the idea, then the system updates the idea status to approved and the idea owner gets a notification of this.
nls.name: Notify Idea Owner of Approval

nls.description: Set Idea status to Approved
nls.name: Set Idea status to Approved

nls.description: Notify Approved
nls.name: Notify Approved

message.name: El patrocinador ha aprovat la idea: ${thisIdea.name}.
Sponzor schválil váš návrh: ${thisIdea.name}
Sponsoren har godkendt din ide: ${thisIdea.name}
Der Sponsor hat Ihre Idee genehmigt: ${thisIdea.name}
The Sponsor approved your idea: ${thisIdea.name}
El patrocinador ha aprobado la idea: ${thisIdea.name}
Sponsori hyväksyi idean: ${thisIdea.name}
Le sponsor a approuvé votre idée : ${thisIdea.name}

Idea approvata dallo sponsor: ${thisIdea.name}
スポンサーがアイデアを承認しました: ${thisIdea.name}

贊助者已經核准您的構想：${thisIdea.name}

nls.description: If the Sponsor sets their action item to Incomplete then the system updates the Idea status to Incomplete and the Idea Owner gets a notification of this.
nls.name: Notify Idea Owner Idea is Incomplete

nls.description: Set Idea status to Incomplete
nls.name: Set Idea status to Incomplete

Action.aiSubject: Your idea was marked as incomplete: ${thisIdea.name}

nls.description: Notify the Idea Owner that the Idea is incomplete.
nls.name: Notify Incomplete Idea

message.name: S'ha marcat la següent idea com a incompleta: ${thisIdea.name}.
Váš návrh byl označen jako nekompletní: ${thisIdea.name}
Din idé er blevet markeret som ikke færdig: ${thisIdea.name}
Ihre Idee wurde als unvollständig markiert: ${thisIdea.name}
Your idea was marked as incomplete: ${thisIdea.name}
Se ha marcado la siguiente idea como incompleta: ${thisIdea.name}.

您的构思被标为不完整: ${thisIdea.name}
您的構想已標示為不完整：${thisIdea.name}

nls.name: Check Idea Category and Type on List
